title: Kohl’s $10 off $25 Instant Savings (Includes Nike, New Balance, Levi’s, plus more!)
description: Wow! Score a rare extra discount on popular name brands and more at Kohl’s! Kohl’s is offering a $10 off $25 purchase when you use promo code INSTANT10 at checkout! Limit one per customer. This instant savings even works on name brands that are typically excluded from Kohl’s promo codes, including Nike, New Balance, Vans, Converse, Levi’s, and soRead More
author: Sarah
